summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 9.8°C) and feels like temperature (down 9.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 296 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles) and cloud levels (up 204 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 296.2m lower than yesterday, 204.0m lower than past week, 163.7m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 332m and a high of 1648m, averaging 694.8m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and winds should remain light. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dim outside. Weather patterns to stay the same.
